front.title: Limited Use of Remote Keys for Interconnected CDNs

abstract.t: Sharing private keys amongst administrative entities raises numerous issues for end-users, intermediaries and content origins. The IETF envisions the standardization of protocols to limit the exchange of private keys (LURK). This document presents CDN Interconnection (CDNI) use cases based on the Limited Use of Remote Keys (LURK) protocol and architecture and identifies a set of requirements.
